title: Intellectual honesty, cryptocurrency, & more (Vitalik Buterin)
itunes:title: Intellectual honesty, cryptocurrency, & more (Vitalik Buterin)
description: Julia and guest Vitalik Buterin (creator of the open-source blockchain platform Ethereum) explore a wide range of topics, including: Vitalik's intellectually honest approach to leadership, why prediction markets appear to be biased in favor of Trump, whether it was rational to invest in Bitcoin ten years ago, Vitalik's defense of life extension research against its critics, and more.
